Zach Erdmann

ResumÉ

I write standards compliant HTML, SCSS, and Javascript in Sublime Text. I code by hand because I want control, but I task automate with Grunt, because repeating yourself is a chore. I do my asset work in Photoshop and Affinity, and I write all my best ideas in a Field Notes notebook. I'm self taught in web design with a formal education in experimental narrative and computer science. I keep my code on Github, and snark at Twitter.

Relevant Experience

Apple

Working at the Genius Bar helped me hone my people skills and techinal knowledge, and being at one of the busiest stores in the company has taught me how to accomplish excellent work at a furious pace.

Penzeys Spices

Hired as a writer, this ended up being my first professional design job. I started in asset work, cleaning up photos for a new web redesign. I learned to mockup wireframes in Balsamiq and best practices for asset version control and management. I finished out my time there by designing a special run web feature on marriage equality.

Education

University of Wisconsin – Milwaukee

  • BFA – Film & Video Production with a minor in Computer Science
